scripts.start: concurrently -n "Frontend,Backend" -c "bgCyan.bold,bgMagenta.bold" --kill-others-on-fail "cd frontend & npm start" "cd backend & npm start"
scripts.postinstall: concurrently -n "Frontend,Backend" -c "bgCyan.bold,bgMagenta.bold" --kill-others-on-fail "cd frontend & npm install" "cd backend & npm install"
scripts.test: cd frontend & npm test -- --watchAll=false & cd ../backend & npm test
